# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(HDF_UC)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
HDF_UCPluginInfo.C
HDF_UCCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
HDF_UCPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
HDF_UCMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtHDF_UCFileFormat.C
avtHDF_UCOptions.C
hdf5_a.C
hdf5_d.C
hdf5_f.C
hdf5_g.C
hdf5_s.C
fqindex.C
indexfileC.C
indexfile.C
timestep.C
hdf5_fastquery.C
histogramCache.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
HDF_UCEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtHDF_UCFileFormat.C
avtHDF_UCOptions.C
hdf5_a.C
hdf5_d.C
hdf5_f.C
hdf5_g.C
hdf5_s.C
fqindex.C
indexfileC.C
indexfile.C
timestep.C
hdf5_fastquery.C
histogramCache.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR} ${FASTBIT_INCLUDE_DIR} ${H5PART_INCLUDE_DIR} 
)

IF(WIN32)
  ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_HDF5USEDLL_)
ENDIF(WIN32)

SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR}/databases)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} ${FASTBIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${H5PART_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IHDF_UCDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IHDF_UCDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IHDF_UCDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MHDF_UCDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MHDF_UCDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${FASTBIT_LIB} ${H5PART_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} ${ZLIB_LIB})
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(MHDF_UCDatabase
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DMDSERVER"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MHDF_UCDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EHDF_UCDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EHDF_UCDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${FASTBIT_LIB} ${H5PART_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} ${ZLIB_LIB})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EHDF_UCDatabase_ser
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EHDF_UCDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EHDF_UCDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EHDF_UCDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${FASTBIT_LIB} ${H5PART_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} ${ZLIB_LIB} )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EHDF_UCDatabase_par
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EHDF_UCDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
